abstract: Preview of upcoming game between Cincinnati Bengals and Denver Broncos.
lead_paragraph: A prime-time game between two top teams has lost some excitement with A. J. McCarron and Brock Osweiler filling in for Andy Dalton and Peyton Manning.

headline.main: Monday Night Matchup: Bengals (11-3) at Broncos (10-4)

snippet: A prime-time game between two top teams has lost some excitement with A. J. McCarron and Brock Osweiler filling in for Andy Dalton and Peyton Manning.
